item.title: Testing, Testing... 1, 2, 3
item.author: adas59@asu.edu (Amitabh Das)
item.description: I am a developer. I don’t care about testing. – The young developer Of course it starts like that. And right when you are presenting your project in front of others, you realize that the feature isn’t working. My god, what a terrifying situation. Then you realize the importance of testing. You find out about the different types of testing, and how you wish that you had written tests for each feature/fix you committed so that the problem would have been caught immediately.
